sentence: Three of four trafficked girls are trafficked for sexual exploitation  the form most reported in the Americas, Europe, East Asia and the Pacific  while boys are more likely to be trafficked for forced labour, the most commonly detected form of trafficking in sub-Saharan Africa.

sdg_query: enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
sentence: Closing the data gaps is essential to achieving a forward-facing, rights-based approach to child migration and hinges upon local, national, regional and global collaboration, in addition to cooperation between communities, governments, NGOs, and civil society partners.

sdg_query: enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
sentence: These efforts might include collecting data on the multitude of reasons children and young adults migrate and analysing how these reasons differ by sex and age  including how experiences shift from early childhood through adolescence; investing in data systems to better measure the number of internally displaced children by sex and age; and supporting citizen-generated data to better understand gaps in service provisions for girls and boys on the move.
